+----------+-----+-------+------+
|      one | two | three | four |
+----------+-----+-------+------+
| 'byebye' |   3 |    33 |  'e' |
+----------+-----+-------+------+
+-----------+-------+
|       one | three |
+-----------+-------+
|   'hello' |    11 |
| 'goodbye' |    22 |
+-----------+-------+
+----------+-----+-------+------+
|      one | two | three | four |
+----------+-----+-------+------+
| 'byebye' |   3 |    33 |  'e' |
+----------+-----+-------+------+
+-----+-----+-------+------+
| one | two | three | four |
